title: trade profound
content: He stared out the window at the snowy field. He'd been stuck in the house for close to a month and his only view of the outside world was through the window.

title: revolut want
content: There wasn't much to see. It was mostly just the field with an occasional bird or small animal who ventured into the field.

title: pride honor
content: As he continued to stare out the window, he wondered how much longer he'd be shackled to the steel bar inside the house.
